  • Method Details

    • getBukkitWorld

      @Nullable public static @Nullable org.bukkit.World getBukkitWorld(IPWorld pWorld)
      Converts an IPWorld object to a World object.

      If the IPLocation is an PWorldSpigot, only a simple cast is performed. Otherwise, a new World is constructed.

      Parameters:
      pWorld - The BigDoors world.
      Returns:
      The Spigot world.

    • getBukkitLocation

      public static org.bukkit.Location getBukkitLocation(IPLocation pLocation)
      Converts an IPLocation object to a Location object.

      If the IPLocation is an PLocationSpigot, only a simple cast is performed. Otherwise, a new Location is constructed.

      Parameters:
      pLocation - The BigDoors location.
      Returns:
      The Spigot location.
